channel.title: static blog generators on code.zoia.org
channel.description: Recent content in static blog generators on code.zoia.org

item.title: Blog migrated to Pelican
item.description: A year ago I started developing a static blogging engine called Ristretto. It was written in Python, used markdown files as input, Jinja2 for templating, and generated static html files on my web server. Some weeks later, I migrated my main blog (zoia.org) and this blog from Wordpress to my new blogging platform. Compared to writing in Wordpress, I enjoyed the new platform a lot. Over 2013 I kept adding functionality to Ristretto.
